definitions.title: vb. flow, stream
definitions.body: (Ar. nahara run, flow; perh. denom. fr. nahrun river, and this loan-wd. (cf. Frä:285); As. nûru, stream, river, Dl:HWB 440; Aram. nahro0, [[נַהֲרָא]] river);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְנָֽהֲרוּ]] Is 2:2 + 2 t.; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִנְהֲרוּ]] Je 51:44; —flow, stream only fig.: of restored Isr. streaming ´[[עַל־דָּגׇן וגו]] ´[[אֶל־טוּב י]] Je 31:12; nations to ([[אֶל־]]) Bel 51:44; to temple-hill at Jerus. Is 2:2 ([[אֵלָיו]]) = Mic 4:1 ([[עָלָיו]]).
